data.why:
X11::WM::Sawfish.pm - The Sawfish window manager is configured and
    controlled by a binding to a LISP based language. The window manager
    will evaluate LISP forms submitted through either UNIX domain
    sockets or X server window properties. This module (already written)
    speaks those two protocols so that control of Sawmill from Perl
    becomes trivial.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (AGRICOCB; Craig B. Agricola)
